A

AbstractApplication - Class in Unnamed Package
Skeletal implementation of the Application interface to minimize the effort required to implement it.
AbstractApplication(Device) - Constructor for class AbstractApplication
Creates a new AbstractApplication with the given Device it will be connected to.
AbstractDevice - Class in Unnamed Package
Skeletal implementation of the Device interface to minimize the effort required to implement it.
AbstractDevice(int, boolean) - Constructor for class AbstractDevice
Creates a new AbstractDevice with the given identifier and set whether it wants to receive broadcast messages.

addApplication(int, Application) - Method in interface Device
Add the given Application to this Device by having it listen on the given port.
addDevice(Device) - Method in class Motherboard
Adds the given Device to this Motherboard.
Application - Interface in Unnamed Package
Represents an Application on a Device
appMapping - Variable in class AbstractDevice
mapping of Application to port; each Application can only listen on one port

appMapping() - Method in interface Device

M

Message - Class in Unnamed Package
Represents a Message that will be sent from Applications and Devices to other Devices and Applications.
Message(int, int, String) - Constructor for class Message
Creates a new Message with no error checking.
Mock - Class in Unnamed Package
Mock class to contain mock implementations of the skeletal abstract classes AbstractDevice and AbstractApplication.

Mock implementation of the skeletal abstract class AbstractApplication for testing.

Motherboard - Class in Unnamed Package
